author: Insality
description: Deployer - Universal build && deploy script for Defold projects.
name: Deployer

releases.message:
https://github.com/Insality/defold-deployer/issues/21 Add --resource-local-cache settings param. The deployer build will use his own build folder to keep cache
https://github.com/Insality/defold-deployer/pull/22 Add build time in seconds. Add deployer build stats of every build saving to csv (optional)

#14 Now work even without _.git_ folder
#15 Add pre-post build hooks
Add _is_build_html_report_ flag
Add _enable_incremental_android_version_code_ flag

Add some improvements:


#11 No resolve by default
#12  Better deployer output messages
#13 Add additional bob SHA check. On mismatch - redownload
Fix on report file naming

Add Desktop builds
Add headless run
More useful logs
Add build number to version
Add settings params
